item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:-83 Chances: Analysts are taking a more favorable view of SoFi Technologies’ situation. The analyst thinks the market doesn’t yet appreciate the advantages the digital lender has over its peers. SoFi management expects earnings to grow robustly over several years. SoFi stock might quickly turn cheap despite looking expensive in 2024.
